questions.q: What comes next in the sequence: 2, 4, 8, 16, ...?
If you have a 3-liter jug and a 5-liter jug, how can you measure exactly 4 liters?
questions.exp: Fill 5, pour into 3. You have 2L left. Empty 3. Pour 2L into 3. Fill 5, pour into 3 (needs 1L). 5 - 1 = 4.
